content: mini wreath for christmas b y a g n e s c h o w @ a g n e s g u r u m i materials worsted weight yarn 5mm hook instructions tapestry needle twine ribbon and bell optional chain 51 insert hook at 2nd st of hook 3hdc at each st to the end 150 abbreviations sts leave a 12 tail and cut yarn chain chain use a tapestry needle to sew st stitch through the center of work to half_double_crochet half double crechet form a circle tie knots with the cast on tail tie a 8 twine or ribbon with a bell at the top decorate it with a ribbon merry christmas please enjoy this free pattern and give credits to @agnesgurumi on instagram copyright 2022© this pattern is for personal use only and may not be sold posted published copied or reproduced in any form without prior written permission of agnes chow @agnesgurumi
